title: Crime Alert 04.22.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 04.22.19
description:
Investigators are retesting DNA evidence in the unsolved killing an Atlantic City entertainer stabbed to death 34 years ago. Chicago woman charged with abuse or neglect, after her elderly mother and 11 children were found living in squalor. An Ohio inmate serving life in prison for murder is sentenced to 86 more years after stabbing 5 others.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
